name: Tycho Celchu: Master Pilot Quiz / Test | Star Wars Books | 10 Questions

questions.text: What planet did Tycho hail from?
questions.explanation:
Alderaan.

	Tycho defected from the Empire after the destruction of Alderaan. He later took part in the battle of Hoth.

questions.text: While in training to become a TIE-fighter pilot, who was Tycho's teacher?
questions.explanation:
Soontir Fel.

	Soontir was an ace pilot in his own right and served as a teacher in between tours of duty. He also trained Derek "Hobbie" Klivian.

Winter.

	Winter was a childhood friend of Leia Organa, and a spy often attached to Rogue Squadron. Also hailing from Alderaan, she married Tycho Celchu and supported the Alliance in the Second Corellian Insurrection.

questions.text: Who objected to Tycho's appointment as Executive Officer of Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
General Horton  Salm.

	Salm still doubted Tycho's loyalty to the Rebellion and happily put Tycho on trial for the murder of Corran Horn. When Horn was found to be alive, the charges were dropped.

questions.text: Tycho resigned from the New Republic.
questions.explanation:
True.

	To combat Ysanne Isard, Celchu, Wedge Antilles and the rest of Rogue Squadron resigned from the Alliance. After they had completed their mission, they found that they had been reinstated and their actions sanctioned.

questions.text: After the battle against Thrawn, which rank was Tycho promoted to?
questions.explanation:
Colonel.

	Admiral Ackbar insisted that Wedge Antilles finally accept a promotion to the rank of General, as he had been refusing consistently for a number of years. Antilles accepted on the condition that Tycho be made a colonel.

questions.text: Which planet did Tycho defend during the Yuuzhan Vong War?
questions.explanation:
Coruscant.

	Tycho came out of retirement to fight against the Yuuzhan Vong in the war, which lasted several years. When Coruscant finally fell, Tycho helped recapture Borleias.

questions.text: Tycho helped train Syal Antilles, Wedge's daughter.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This took place shortly before the war between the Galactic Alliance and Corellia. In that conflict, Tycho was given the rank of General.

questions.text: Who defended Tycho during his trial?
questions.explanation:
Nawara Ven.

	Nawara Ven was a Twi'lek pilot from Rogue Squadron and also a lawyer. After losing his leg in battle, he was reassigned to a desk job and made the Executive Officer of Rogue Squadron.

questions.text: Which battle did Tycho not take part in?
questions.explanation:
Yavin IV.

	Tycho flew a snowspeeder at Hoth and an A-Wing at Endor. However, he did not participate in Yavin IV, which resulted in the destruction of the first Death Star.
